src.land
Class Water

java.lang.Object
  src.land.Water
All Implemented Interfaces:
Land
public class Water
extends java.lang.Object
implements Land

A water land object. Not used for now. Maybe the next release will support water types.

Author:
Darren Watts date 11/14/07
